sqlMap.select:
select SN, LAYER_SN, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_ORDER, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME from pano_perspective_element
order by $orderByClause$

select SN, LAYER_SN, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_ORDER, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME from pano_perspective_element where SN = #sn:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into pano_perspective_element (LAYER_SN, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_ORDER, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#layerSn:BIGINT#, #elementName:VARCHAR#, #elementOrder:INTEGER#, #packageTypeSn:BIGINT#, #elementProductSn:BIGINT#, #adderSn:BIGINT#, #adderName:VARCHAR#, #addTime:TIMESTAMP#, #updaterSn:BIGINT#, #updaterName:VARCHAR#, #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#)
select last_insert_id()

values

)

sqlMap.update:
update pano_perspective_element
SN = #record.sn:BIGINT#
LAYER_SN = #record.layerSn:BIGINT#
ELEMENT_NAME = #record.elementName:VARCHAR#
ELEMENT_ORDER = #record.elementOrder:INTEGER#
PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = #record.packageTypeSn:BIGINT#
ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN = #record.elementProductSn:BIGINT#
ADDER_SN = #record.adderSn:BIGINT#
ADDER_NAME = #record.adderName:VARCHAR#
ADD_TIME = #record.addTime:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATER_SN = #record.updaterSn:BIGINT#
UPDATER_NAME = #record.updaterName:VARCHAR#
UPDATE_TIME = #record.updateTime:TIMESTAMP#

update pano_perspective_element set SN = #record.sn:BIGINT#, LAYER_SN = #record.layerSn:BIGINT#, ELEMENT_NAME = #record.elementName:VARCHAR#, ELEMENT_ORDER = #record.elementOrder:INTEGER#, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = #record.packageTypeSn:BIGINT#, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN = #record.elementProductSn:BIGINT#, ADDER_SN = #record.adderSn:BIGINT#, ADDER_NAME = #record.adderName:VARCHAR#, ADD_TIME = #record.addTime:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATER_SN = #record.updaterSn:BIGINT#, UPDATER_NAME = #record.updaterName:VARCHAR#, UPDATE_TIME = #record.updateTime:TIMESTAMP#

update pano_perspective_element
LAYER_SN = #layerSn:BIGINT#
ELEMENT_NAME = #elementName:VARCHAR#
ELEMENT_ORDER = #elementOrder:INTEGER#
PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = #packageTypeSn:BIGINT#
ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN = #elementProductSn:BIGINT#
ADDER_SN = #adderSn:BIGINT#
ADDER_NAME = #adderName:VARCHAR#
ADD_TIME = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATER_SN = #updaterSn:BIGINT#
UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName:VARCHAR#
UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:TIMESTAMP#
where SN = #sn:BIGINT#

update pano_perspective_element set LAYER_SN = #layerSn:BIGINT#, ELEMENT_NAME = #elementName:VARCHAR#, ELEMENT_ORDER = #elementOrder:INTEGER#, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN = #packageTypeSn:BIGINT#, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN = #elementProductSn:BIGINT#, ADDER_SN = #adderSn:BIGINT#, ADDER_NAME = #adderName:VARCHAR#, ADD_TIME = #addTime:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATER_SN = #updaterSn:BIGINT#, UPDATER_NAME = #updaterName:VARCHAR#, UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime:TIMESTAMP# where SN = #sn:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select: select SN, LAYER_SN, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_ORDER, PACKAGE_TYPE_SN, ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME from pano_perspective_element limit #startRecord#,#perPageInt#

SELECT product.sn AS sn, product.id AS id, product.`NAME` AS name, product.summary AS summary, product.dimension AS dimension, product.`LONG_IMG_SN` AS longImgSn, vender.name AS venderName, elementProduct.product_map AS mapid, elementProduct.sn AS elementProductSn, elementProduct.`position` AS position, elementProduct.`scale` AS scale, elementProduct.`repeating` AS repeating, elementProduct.`ELEMENT_SN` AS elementSn FROM pano_perspective_element element INNER JOIN pano_project_package_product packageProduct ON element.`PACKAGE_TYPE_SN` = packageProduct.`PACKAGE_TYPE_SN` INNER JOIN pano_product product ON product.`SN` = packageProduct.`PRODUCT_SN` INNER JOIN pano_project_vender vender ON vender.sn = product.vendername LEFT JOIN pano_perspective_element_product elementProduct ON (product.`SN` = elementProduct.product_sn AND elementProduct.`ELEMENT_SN` = element.`SN`) WHERE element.`SN` = #sn# ORDER BY packageProduct.`ORDER_NUM` ASC

SELECT element.sn AS id, packageType.NAME AS name, element.`LAYER_SN` AS layerSn, element.`ELEMENT_ORDER` AS elementOrder, element.`PACKAGE_TYPE_SN` AS packageTypeSn, element.`ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN` AS elementProductSn, elementProduct.PRODUCT_MAP AS mapid, elementProduct.`position` AS position, elementProduct.`scale` AS scale, elementProduct.`repeating` AS repeating FROM pano_perspective_element element INNER JOIN pano_project_package_type packageType ON element.`PACKAGE_TYPE_SN` = packageType.sn LEFT JOIN (SELECT _elementProduct.* FROM pano_perspective_element_product _elementProduct INNER JOIN pano_product product ON _elementProduct.product_sn = product.sn) AS elementProduct ON element.ELEMENT_PRODUCT_SN = elementProduct.sn WHERE element.`LAYER_SN` = #layerSn# ORDER BY element.`ELEMENT_ORDER` ASC
SELECT MAX(element.`ELEMENT_ORDER`) FROM pano_perspective_element element WHERE element.`LAYER_SN` = #layerSn#
SELECT element.`ELEMENT_ORDER` FROM pano_perspective_element element WHERE element.`SN` = #elementSn#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE pano_perspective_element element SET element.element_product_sn = #elementProductSn# WHERE element.sn = #sn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE element.*, elementProduct.* FROM pano_perspective_element element LEFT JOIN pano_perspective_element_product elementProduct ON element.sn = elementProduct.`ELEMENT_SN` WHERE element.sn = #sn#
